(Could we stick this reply before KitKat left the bridge?)


Quickstrike:



Quickstrike couldn't help but laugh. The metal strips at his cheeks 
twitched when he did so. He always wanted to see their reactions. 

"Surprisin', ain't it?" he said. "Come on, didn't think uh ol' 
veteran like mahself couldn't make it? Ah made Megatron an' y'all 
think ah was dead. Ah stayed wit' Black Arachnia an' her bunch." He 
crossed his arms and looked at DrillBit. He was a little disappointed 
that was being ordered around. 

"Do what now?" he asked, narrowing his bright crimson optics a 
little. He looked around. "Ah reckon ah'm missin' out on somethin', 
but what? All ah heard that we's gonna fight someone called th' 
Alliance. Anyone wanna fill me in?"
